name: Cross of Auria: Episode 1
description: Cross of Auria is a primarily story-driven classic style turn-based RPG. Play as the female protagonist Ruby and help her reclaim everyone's memories from the Scourge and the evil forces who created it. Influenced by JRPG, MMO, and comic book concepts.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VIDEO CARD: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Any modern PC will do.
